caption: A man with sunglasses was talking on the phone. Behind him were two men, and there was a woman nearby. The elevator arrived at a floor, and the woman hurriedly got off. She climbed many steps and arrived at a place where there were many stylish women. Two women were sitting by the pool. Another woman entered the changing room and began undressing. At that moment, a man appeared. Three women sat on benches by the lake. The scene returned to the office building with stylish women. A woman accidentally fell, and a man in a suit helped her up. The woman slept in bed, then quickly got up, freshened up, and walked out of the room.
